messages.message: Hi folks, we're planning on pausing upgrades to the current platform.instabase.com (http://platform.instabase.com) environment on GCP. Soon, we will be redirecting the current ib-internal.prod environment to the platform URL. All of the data in s3 and the DB on platform.instabase.com (http://platform.instabase.com) will be available on ib-internal. Does anyone have any concerns with pausing the upgrades today?
Ah! Yes, I'll get that job disabled now. Nothing destructive, can be flipped back on trivially
